name: exceptionDuringOperation(_:error:leftOperand:rightOperand:)
desc: Specifies what an NSDecimalNumber object will do when it encounters an error.Required.
declaration:
func exceptionDuringOperation(_ operation: Selector, 
                        error: NSDecimalNumber.CalculationError, 
                  leftOperand: NSDecimalNumber, 
                 rightOperand: NSDecimalNumber?) -> NSDecimalNumber?
